content: The rapid development of large‐scale energy storage systems which are capable of storing renewable energy such as solar, wind, and hydro as electricity could lead to an established system that offers continuous energy supply to future energy storage devices.[] Lithium‐ion batteries (LIBs) with high energy density is a widely accepted power source for portable electronic devices and electrical vehicles.[]
Sections.name: Introduction

Title: Microcrystalline Hybridization Enhanced Coal‐Based Carbon Anode for Advanced Sodium‐Ion Batteries
